name: Cúchulainn
description:
Follow the story of one of Ireland's Mythical Warriors!

This game is based off the story of Cúchulainn, an old Irish tale that is well known in our country. Fight two bosses in this combat oriented side-scrolling game.

Controllers are supported. 

This Game was made within a week for the "Historically Accurate Game Jam 5"

all assets were created within that week. 

The game was intended to be longer,  but time constraints cut the content.
